recipesJson.name: The Crippler
recipesJson.author: DumHed
recipesJson.description: Super simple(and unoriginal), I know, but I just had to share. I used eyemakepizza's ice cream trinity and added THE BEST strawberry combo, Inw shisha strawberry, and Tpa sweet strawberry. This strawberry combo is super bright and delicious, and of course I added super sweet to enhance the strawberries.  I am using a Hussar legacy single coil rda with a .24 NI80 Alien, and a QP juggerknot mini single coil RTA with a .24 NI80 3core fused clapton.
